alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 5:22AM CDT until September 08 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN FRANKLIN AND EASTERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 522 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Lake Fort Smith, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Ozark... Mountainburg... Mulberry... Chester... Cass... Lake Fort Smith... Fern... Jethro... Bidville... Barnes... Redding... Watalula... Piney... Toney... Locke... Turners Bend... Mount Gayler... Vesta... Cecil... Lonelm... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 19 and 35. Interstate 49 between mile markers 30 and 38. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
